title: New: Noble Oak – Patience
content:
Dayyummn.

How isn’t this kid massive?! Noble Oak may well be one of my favourite artists at this moment in time, with his regular and consistently amazing output; newest track Patience showcases a more progressive side to Fiore. Fusing early 00’s dubstep influences with the modern R&B sound pioneered by the likes of How To Dress Well, it’s diverse and utterly beautiful. Whilst I perhaps jumped the gun by predicting that 2012 would be the year of Noble Oak, his material has certainly been deserving of a larger audience, hopefully 2013 will see more people opening their ears up to the young Canadian. Check out Patience below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
